remarks: A group's properties using the explicit identity element.  (Contributed by NM, 5-Feb-2010.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
grpoidval.1 $e |- X = ran G $.
grpoidval.2 $e |- U = ( GId ` G ) $.
grpoidinv2 $p |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( ( U G A ) = A /\ ( A G U ) = A ) /\ E. y e. X ( ( y G A ) = U /\ ( A G y ) = U ) ) ) $.
$d A y $.
$d G y $.
$d U y $.
$d X y $.
